prea.util
Class RankEvaluator

java.lang.Object
  prea.util.RankEvaluator

public class RankEvaluator
extends java.lang.Object

This is a class providing rank-based evaluation metrics. Unlike EvaluationMetrics class, this considers both (test, test) and (test, train) pairs for evaluation purpose.

Since:
2013. 5. 28
Version:
1.1
Author:
Joonseok Lee
